channel.title: Westeros-Scape [718] - Devs and Moderlers needed!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://westeros-scape.com/westsmall.png[/img][/center] Hi, I am currently looking for around 2 new developers to help me and my current developer with a project we are working on; "Westeros-Scape" it is based on the world of Westeros, Game of Thrones and we are trying very hard to make it a unique and fun experience, but with just two of us it is quite difficult. We are also looking for a modeler, as we need loads of new items, such as weapons, armour and other quest based items. We would also need new NPC's. Developers: Too apply for the developer slots you must have: - 1 year+ experience with 718's. - A rough understanding of Westeros or Game of Thrones. - The ability to easily add new NPC's and quests along with general RSPS coding skills. Desired Ability's: - A great understanding of the lore of Westeros. - The ability to make custom, in-house editing tools such as map editors. - A drive to work hard. Modelers: Too apply for the modeler slot you must have: - Good 3D modeling skills. - The ability to pack models in to a cache to speed the development process. - A rough understanding of Westeros or Game of Thrones. Desired Ability's: - 2 years+ of experience with 3D modeling. - A drive to work hard. Form to fill out:
Name: Age: Job Applying for: Experience: Links to previous work: Skype: Time Zone: Any other information:
Thanks, Sirjoot//Laurence - Main Owner of Westeros-Scape

item.title: Westeros-Scape [718] - Devs and Moderlers needed!
item.dc:creator: @sirjoot sirjoot
item.description:
@sirjoot wrote:

[center][/center]

Hi, I am currently looking for around 2 new developers to help me and my current developer with a project we are working on; “Westeros-Scape” it is based on the world of Westeros, Game of Thrones and we are trying very hard to make it a unique and fun experience, but with just two of us it is quite difficult. We are also looking for a modeler, as we need loads of new items, such as weapons, armour and other quest based items. We would also need new NPC’s.

Developers:
Too apply for the developer slots you must have:

  • 1 year+ experience with 718’s.
  • A rough understanding of Westeros or Game of Thrones.
  • The ability to easily add new NPC’s and quests along with general RSPS coding skills.

Desired Ability’s:

  • A great understanding of the lore of Westeros.
  • The ability to make custom, in-house editing tools such as map editors.
  • A drive to work hard.

Modelers:
Too apply for the modeler slot you must have:

  • Good 3D modeling skills.
  • The ability to pack models in to a cache to speed the development process.
  • A rough understanding of Westeros or Game of Thrones.

Desired Ability’s:

  • 2 years+ of experience with 3D modeling.
  • A drive to work hard.

Form to fill out:

Name: Age: Job Applying for: Experience: Links to previous work: Skype: Time Zone: Any other information:

Thanks,
Sirjoot//Laurence - Main Owner of Westeros-Scape

Read full topic
